title: MD
biography: John B. Gorrie was a Nevisian-born American physician and scientist, credited as the inventor of mechanical refrigeration.
aiSummary: John D. Minna is a lung cancer biology specialist with an H-index of 173 at UT Southwestern (Faculty). Has been published in Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, JAMA, Nature. Based in United States.
